data.title: Fenton and Hennessey
data.text:
Irene T. Bussino Schaefer

January 16, 1929 - August 5, 2024

On August 5, Irene was called home to be with the Lord. Born in Ware, MA on January 16, 1929, to Bertha (Kulig) and George Lanou. Irene moved with her family to Saxtons River, VT...

June 9, 1931 - August 2, 2024

Joan E. Beach passed away on August 2, 2024, at Langdon Place in Keene, NH. Joan was born on June 9, 1931, in Northampton, MA to Lewis and Katherine (Warren) Newman. Joan graduated from Northampton...

January 9, 1971 - July 29, 2024

Ann Marie Pacific passed away unexpectedly on July 29, 2024, at her home. Ann was born on January 9, 1971, in Danbury CT to Edward and Lucinda (Tenney) Pacific. She attended Bellows Falls Union High...

May 21, 1945 - July 26, 2024

July 14, 1940 - July 28, 2024
